greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of odd entries in row n of Pascal's triangle.
comment: a(n) = a power of 2 iff n = 2^k - 2, 2^k - 1 or 2^k.
Sums of rows of the triangle in A143333. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 24 2010
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3420
mathematica: f[n_] := Plus @@ Select[ Table[ Binomial[n, i], {i, 0, n}], OddQ[ # ] & ]; Table[ f[n], {n, 0, 38}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 19 2003 *)
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 17 2003
ext: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_ and _Ray Chandler_, Nov 19 2003
